title: Help Im being hacked (riot employee needed)
body: Basically, Iv created support tickets but i don't know how long i have on my account they haven't changed my password so i can still log on but they have my account information and have changed the email so they have full access to my stuff. They also started to hack into my friend's accounts via links. They send you to like the league of legends site saying you will get the riot kayle skin coming out or the free dreadknight garen skin that was available a long time ago i believe. However, the link redirects after you sign yourself into the league site and they get your account information. I would just like my email reset and to anyone else facing this current issue and my 5lp back for dodging my ranked game would be nice too ;-; rito help and you get caught into the trap easily because they log into your account afterwards and send it to all your friends causing more and more people to be caught in this

replies.body:
Clicking on unsolicited links is always a risky click, even if it's from a friend. Since you've already submitted a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), sit tight and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
The problem is the hacker also submitted a support ticket do you guys do like ip verification or whatever

We go through very rigorous vetting to ensure we're recovering an account to the right person. I'm confident in my team members to handle the situation very well. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
